Author: cactusfarm
Text: i’m so sorry. this all sounds so horrible.   i hope you can recover soon. my pms are open if you need me. i have also struggled with addiction + ed, and i’m currently 2 weeks sober. i hope you can find peace.

Author: ghoultearzz
Text: i know how to die so easily but im scared it won't work bcs of the medication im on. all i want to do before i die is listen to my favorite music and be comfortable and say my goodbyes but idk where to do this
